column5: Hey Guys,  Me and 4 friends are looking to do some salmon fishing either on huron or lake o. Does anyone know anyone who does this at a good price?  thanks guys,  dobee
Try fishmaster out of Dunnville. He always puts people on fish. Give Steve a call at 905-701-6874. He fishes Lake Ontario.
Thanks for the Plug Smokey ....Dobee have a look at my site http://www.mountaincable.net/~fishmaster 1-866-862-2380
Check out this site Ontario Sportfishing Guide Association  You will find a lot of good options for both lakes there.
